constraints.constraint: A qualifier constraint MAY constrain another constraint in this spec.

qualifiers.constraint: A qualifier MAY NOT qualify a constraint outside its immediate scope.

constraints.constraint: The build of every spec that inherits this spec MUST aggregate all of this spec's structural properties and values, including inherited properties.
A doc which conforms to this spec MUST NOT violate any constraint in this spec's build.
Every included specdoc is itself a doc which MUST conform to the spec in this spec's spec property
